name: outside

exits.description: To the North is a room with a shag carpet.
The lab walls rise imposingly to your Northeast, preventing any progress in that direction.
To the East the grass grows too tall to the meander through.  You can't go this way.
To the Southeast the grass grows too tall to the meander through.  You can't go this way.
You see a dirt mound rising in the distance to the South.
You see never ending grass.  You can't go this way.
To the West the grass grows quite tall, but you think you see a passage through .
The lab walls rise imposingly to your Northwest, preventing any progress in that direction..
The clear blue sky seems to go on infinitely above you.
The grass rustling in the wind comes up to your knees.

description:
You've entered the great outdoors.  The sun shines lightly down on your face as a cool breeze rustles your hair.  Your condition makes the once-familiar into the strange.
    What had been a nice garden to lunch now seems like a fantastic forest with giant trees and flowers.  To the South you see a dirt mound.  To the West you see tall grass.
